quote_text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
cta: He is your safe place while you heal.

description: The light of the world. 1. John 8:12 | 2. Psalm 18:28 | 3. Micah 7:8 | 4. John 1:5
quote_text: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
cta: Darkness cannot win where Jesus is.

description: Enduring through the valley. 1. Psalm 23:4 | 2. Isaiah 43:2 | 3. Hebrews 13:5 | 4. Joshua 1:9
quote_text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.
cta: The Shepherd is walking right beside you.

description: God's thoughts about you. 1. Psalm 139:17-18 | 2. Jeremiah 29:11 | 3. Luke 12:7 | 4. Isaiah 49:16
quote_text: How precious to me are your thoughts, O God! How vast is the sum of them!
cta: You are more precious to Him than you know.

description: He transforms your mourning. 1. Psalm 30:11 | 2. Jeremiah 31:13 | 3. Isaiah 61:3 | 4. Matthew 5:4
quote_text: You turned my wailing into dancing; you removed my sackcloth and clothed me with joy.

description: Contentment in Christ. 1. Philippians 4:11-13 | 2. 1 Timothy 6:6 | 3. Hebrews 13:5 | 4. Psalm 16:11
quote_text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
cta: His strength is enough for your today.

description: God’s faithfulness is new every day. 1. Lamentations 3:22-23 | 2. Psalm 143:8 | 3. Deuteronomy 7:9 | 4. 2 Timothy 2:13
quote_text: Because of the Lord’s great love we are not consumed... his compassions never fail. They are new every morning.
cta: Wake up to new mercies tomorrow morning.

description: A heart at rest. 1. Matthew 11:28-30 | 2. Psalm 62:1 | 3. Isaiah 30:15 | 4. Hebrews 4:9
quote_text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
cta: Bring your heavy heart to Jesus.

description: Refining through the fire. 1. 1 Peter 1:7 | 2. Job 23:10 | 3. Zechariah 13:9 | 4. Malachi 3:3
quote_text: When he has tested me, I will come forth as gold.
cta: You are coming out of this stronger and more pure.

description: The shield of faith. 1. Ephesians 6:16 | 2. Psalm 18:30 | 3. Proverbs 30:5 | 4. Genesis 15:1
quote_text: In addition to all this, take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.
cta: Protect your heart with faith today.

description: God's love is better than life. 1. Psalm 63:3 | 2. Romans 5:5 | 3. 1 John 4:19 | 4. Ephesians 3:18
quote_text: Because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you.
cta: Even in heartbreak, His love is enough.

description: Peace be still. 1. Mark 4:39 | 2. Psalm 107:29 | 3. Job 37:14 | 4. Isaiah 26:3
quote_text: He got up, rebuked the wind and said to the waves, 'Quiet! Be still!'
cta: Let Jesus speak peace to your internal storm.

description: The Father's embrace. 1. Luke 15:20 | 2. Deuteronomy 33:27 | 3. Isaiah 46:4 | 4. Psalm 27:10
quote_text: But while he was still a long way off, his father saw him and was filled with compassion for him; he ran to his son, threw his arms around him and kissed him.
cta: Run into the Father’s arms today.

description: An everlasting hope. 1. Romans 15:13 | 2. 1 Peter 1:3 | 3. Hebrews 6:19 | 4. Psalm 71:14
quote_text: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.
cta: Hope is the anchor that keeps you steady.

description: The power of the Holy Spirit. 1. Romans 15:13 | 2. Acts 1:8 | 3. Galatians 5:22 | 4. John 14:16
quote_text: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you.
cta: The Holy Spirit is your Helper in this healing journey.

description: A heart after God. 1. Psalm 42:1 | 2. Psalm 63:1 | 3. Psalm 84:2 | 4. Matthew 5:6
quote_text: As the deer pants for streams of water, so my soul pants for you, my God.
cta: Let your heartbreak lead you closer to God.

description: Victory in Christ. 1. Romans 8:37 | 2. 1 Corinthians 15:57 | 3. 2 Corinthians 2:14 | 4. 1 John 5:4
quote_text: In all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.
cta: You are a victor, not a victim.

description: Confidence in prayer. 1. 1 John 5:14-15 | 2. Philippians 4:6 | 3. Psalm 116:2 | 4. Matthew 21:22
quote_text: This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.
cta: He is listening to your heart's cry right now.

description: The oil of joy. 1. Isaiah 61:3 | 2. Psalm 23:5 | 3. Psalm 45:7 | 4. Hebrews 1:9
quote_text: He has anointed me... to provide for those who grieve... the oil of joy instead of mourning.
cta: Receive the oil of joy for your mourning soul.

description: Walking into freedom. 1. Galatians 5:1 | 2. John 8:36 | 3. 2 Corinthians 3:17 | 4. Psalm 119:45
quote_text: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.
cta: Walk out of the prison of your past today.

description: Steadfast love. 1. Lamentations 3:22 | 2. Psalm 100:5 | 3. Psalm 103:17 | 4. Isaiah 54:10
quote_text: Because of the Lord’s great love we are not consumed, for his compassions never fail.
cta: His love is the one constant in your life.

description: Safe in His hands. 1. John 10:28-29 | 2. Psalm 31:5 | 3. Isaiah 49:16 | 4. Psalm 91:4
quote_text: No one will snatch them out of my hand.
cta: You are held by the strongest hands in existence.

description: A heart of peace. 1. Colossians 3:15 | 2. Isaiah 26:3 | 3. John 14:27 | 4. Psalm 4:8
quote_text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts.
cta: Is peace ruling your heart today?

description: He makes all things new. 1. Revelation 21:5 | 2. Isaiah 43:19 | 3. 2 Corinthians 5:17 | 4. Lamentations 3:23
quote_text: He who was seated on the throne said, 'I am making everything new!'
cta: The best chapters of your life are yet to be written.

description: The power of a gentle response. 1. Proverbs 15:1 | 2. Proverbs 25:15 | 3. James 1:19 | 4. Colossians 4:6
quote_text: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
cta: Type 'PEACE' if you choose to respond with gentleness today.

description: Be slow to speak and slow to anger. 1. James 1:19-20 | 2. Ecclesiastes 7:9 | 3. Proverbs 14:29 | 4. Psalm 4:4
quote_text: My dear brothers and sisters, take note of this: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry.
cta: Listen more, speak less, love always.

description: Don't let the sun go down on your anger. 1. Ephesians 4:26-27 | 2. Psalm 37:8 | 3. Romans 12:19 | 4. Matthew 5:23-24
quote_text: In your anger do not sin: Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry, and do not give the devil a foothold.
cta: Release your anger before the day ends. Don't give the enemy a foothold.

description: Wisdom vs. Folly. 1. Proverbs 29:11 | 2. Proverbs 12:16 | 3. Proverbs 19:11 | 4. Proverbs 20:3
quote_text: Fools give full vent to their rage, but the wise bring calm in the end.
cta: Wisdom is knowing when to stay silent. Amen?

description: The fruit of self-control. 1. Galatians 5:22-23 | 2. 2 Timothy 1:7 | 3. Proverbs 16:32 | 4. Titus 2:12
quote_text: But the fruit of the Spirit is... patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
cta: Ask the Holy Spirit to produce self-control in you today.

description: Overcoming evil with good. 1. Romans 12:21 | 2. Matthew 5:44 | 3. 1 Peter 3:9 | 4. Proverbs 25:21
quote_text: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
cta: Respond to bitterness with a blessing.

description: Letting go of bitterness. 1. Ephesians 4:31-32 | 2. Hebrews 12:15 | 3. Colossians 3:8 | 4. Leviticus 19:18
quote_text: Get rid of all bitterness, rage and anger, brawling and slander, along with every form of malice.
cta: Empty your heart of rage to make room for God’s peace.

description: Better than a warrior. 1. Proverbs 16:32 | 2. Proverbs 25:28 | 3. James 3:2 | 4. Proverbs 14:17
quote_text: Better a patient person than a warrior, one with self-control than one who takes a city.
cta: The greatest battle is the one within. You can win it with God.

description: Refraining from anger. 1. Psalm 37:8 | 2. Colossians 3:12 | 3. James 1:20 | 4. Proverbs 22:24
quote_text: Refrain from anger and turn from wrath; do not fret—it leads only to evil.
cta: Don't let frustration lead you into sin. Stay in His peace.

description: God’s slow anger as our model. 1. Psalm 103:8 | 2. Joel 2:13 | 3. Exodus 34:6 | 4. Nehemiah 9:17
quote_text: The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love.
cta: As God is patient with you, be patient with others.

description: Wisdom calms the heart. 1. Ecclesiastes 7:9 | 2. Proverbs 14:29 | 3. Proverbs 17:27 | 4. James 3:17
quote_text: Do not be quickly provoked in your spirit, for anger resides in the lap of fools.
cta: Is your spirit easily provoked? Ask God for a calm heart today.

description: The tongue is a fire. 1. James 3:5-6 | 2. Proverbs 18:21 | 3. Psalm 141:3 | 4. Proverbs 21:23
quote_text: Set a guard over my mouth, Lord; keep watch over the door of my lips.
cta: Let your words heal, not wound.

description: Avoiding angry people. 1. Proverbs 22:24-25 | 2. Proverbs 29:22 | 3. 1 Corinthians 15:33 | 4. Proverbs 13:20
quote_text: Do not make friends with a hot-tempered person, do not associate with one easily angered, or you may learn their ways.
cta: Protect your peace by choosing your circle wisely.

description: Righteous vs. Unrighteous anger. 1. Matthew 21:12-13 | 2. Mark 3:5 | 3. Ephesians 4:26 | 4. John 2:15
quote_text: In your anger do not sin.
seo_keywords: is it a sin to be angry
cta: Anger can be a signal, but it shouldn't be the driver.

description: The beauty of an overlook. 1. Proverbs 19:11 | 2. 1 Peter 4:8 | 3. Colossians 3:13 | 4. Proverbs 17:9
quote_text: A person’s wisdom yields patience; it is to one’s glory to overlook an offense.
cta: Choose to overlook the small things today for the sake of peace.

description: A quiet spirit is precious. 1. 1 Peter 3:4 | 2. 1 Thessalonians 4:11 | 3. Isaiah 30:15 | 4. Zephaniah 3:17
quote_text: In quietness and trust is your strength.
cta: Your strength is found in stillness, not shouting.

description: Vengeance is the Lord’s. 1. Romans 12:19 | 2. Deuteronomy 32:35 | 3. Hebrews 10:30 | 4. Proverbs 20:22
quote_text: Do not take revenge, my dear friends, but leave room for God’s wrath.
cta: Let God handle the justice. You handle the peace.

description: The healing power of kindness. 1. Ephesians 4:32 | 2. Proverbs 16:24 | 3. Galatians 5:22 | 4. Luke 6:31
quote_text: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

description: A heart of stone turned to flesh. 1. Ezekiel 36:26 | 2. Psalm 51:10 | 3. 2 Corinthians 5:17 | 4. Ezekiel 11:19
quote_text: I will give you a new heart and put a new spirit in you.
cta: Ask God to soften your heart where it has become hard.

description: Great peace for those who love the Word. 1. Psalm 119:165 | 2. Isaiah 26:3 | 3. John 16:33 | 4. Colossians 3:15
quote_text: Great peace have those who love your law, and nothing can make them stumble.
cta: When you love God's Word, you become harder to offend.

description: The mind set on the Spirit. 1. Romans 8:6 | 2. Galatians 5:16 | 3. Philippians 4:8 | 4. Colossians 3:2
quote_text: The mind governed by the flesh is death, but the mind governed by the Spirit is life and peace.
cta: Set your mind on the Spirit and watch anger fade.

description: Love is not easily angered. 1. 1 Corinthians 13:4-5 | 2. Romans 13:10 | 3. 1 Peter 4:8 | 4. John 13:34
quote_text: Love is patient, love is kind... it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs.
cta: Love is a choice to keep no record of wrongs.

description: Humility ends strife. 1. Proverbs 13:10 | 2. James 4:6 | 3. Philippians 2:3 | 4. Proverbs 11:2
quote_text: Where there is strife, there is pride, but wisdom is found in those who take advice.
cta: Most anger is rooted in pride. Choose humility today.

description: The fruit of righteousness. 1. James 3:18 | 2. Hebrews 12:11 | 3. Isaiah 32:17 | 4. Matthew 5:9
quote_text: Peacemakers who sow in peace reap a harvest of righteousness.
cta: Be a peacemaker, not a wall-builder.

description: God's armor for the heart. 1. Ephesians 6:14-15 | 2. 1 Thessalonians 5:8 | 3. Psalm 5:12 | 4. 2 Corinthians 10:4
quote_text: Stand firm then... with your feet fitted with the readiness that comes from the gospel of peace.
cta: Put on the shoes of peace before you step into the world.

description: Calmness in the storm. 1. Mark 4:39 | 2. Psalm 107:29 | 3. Isaiah 26:3 | 4. John 14:27
quote_text: The Lord stilled the storm to a whisper; the waves of the sea were hushed.
cta: If He can hush the sea, He can hush your anger.

description: Speaking the truth in love. 1. Ephesians 4:15 | 2. Proverbs 16:21 | 3. Colossians 4:6 | 4. 1 Corinthians 16:14
quote_text: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head.
cta: Truth without love is a weapon. Love without truth is a compromise. Use both.

description: God provides an escape. 1. 1 Corinthians 10:13 | 2. 2 Peter 2:9 | 3. Psalm 50:15 | 4. James 4:7
quote_text: No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful... he will also provide a way out.
cta: When anger rises, look for the 'exit' God provides.

description: A heart that loves mercy. 1. Micah 6:8 | 2. Matthew 5:7 | 3. Hosea 6:6 | 4. James 2:13
quote_text: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good... To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
cta: Do you love mercy as much as you love being right?

description: God heals the roots. 1. Hebrews 12:15 | 2. Psalm 147:3 | 3. Isaiah 57:18 | 4. Jeremiah 17:14
quote_text: See to it that no one falls short of the grace of God and that no bitter root grows up to cause trouble.
cta: Don't just trim the branches of anger; ask God to pull the roots.

description: The peace of a guarded heart. 1. Proverbs 4:23 | 2. Philippians 4:7 | 3. Psalm 119:11 | 4. Proverbs 21:23
quote_text: Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.
cta: What are you letting into your heart today?

description: The Lord is your defense. 1. Psalm 62:1-2 | 2. Romans 8:31 | 3. Exodus 14:14 | 4. Psalm 18:2
quote_text: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
cta: You don't need to shout to be heard; God is your advocate.

description: Gentle wisdom from above. 1. James 3:17 | 2. Proverbs 11:2 | 3. 1 Corinthians 1:30 | 4. Job 12:13
quote_text: But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy.
cta: Is your wisdom peace-loving or argument-seeking?

description: Walking in the light. 1. 1 John 2:9-11 | 2. John 8:12 | 3. Ephesians 5:8 | 4. Psalm 119:105
quote_text: Anyone who claims to be in the light but hates a brother or sister is still in the darkness.
cta: Anger can blind us. Let the Light of Jesus show you the way back to love.

description: Strength for the humble. 1. James 4:6 | 2. 1 Peter 5:5 | 3. Psalm 25:9 | 4. Matthew 11:29
quote_text: God opposes the proud but shows favor to the humble.
cta: Lay down your 'right' to be angry and pick up God's favor.

description: A calm answer to conflict. 1. Proverbs 17:1 | 2. Matthew 5:25 | 3. Proverbs 25:15 | 4. Genesis 13:8
quote_text: Better a dry crust with peace and quiet than a house full of feasting, with strife.
cta: Protect the peace of your home today.

description: Living at peace with everyone. 1. Romans 12:18 | 2. Hebrews 12:14 | 3. Mark 9:50 | 4. 2 Corinthians 13:11
quote_text: If it is possible, as far as it depends on you, live at peace with everyone.
seo_keywords: as far as it depends on you
cta: Do your part to keep the peace. God will do the rest.

description: Anointed with the oil of joy. 1. Isaiah 61:3 | 2. Psalm 45:7 | 3. Hebrews 1:9 | 4. Psalm 23:5
quote_text: You love righteousness and hate wickedness; therefore God... has anointed you with the oil of joy.
cta: Anger and joy cannot occupy the same seat. Choose joy.

description: Putting on the new self. 1. Colossians 3:10 | 2. Ephesians 4:24 | 3. 2 Corinthians 5:17 | 4. Romans 6:4
quote_text: Put on the new self, which is being renewed in knowledge in the image of its Creator.
cta: You are a new creation. Your old temper doesn't define you.

description: God's word as a mirror. 1. James 1:23-25 | 2. Psalm 119:9 | 3. Hebrews 4:12 | 4. 2 Timothy 3:16
quote_text: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates... it judges the thoughts and attitudes of the heart.
cta: Let the Word expose and heal your anger today.

description: The safety of the Lord's name. 1. Proverbs 18:10 | 2. Psalm 20:1 | 3. Joel 2:32 | 4. Acts 4:12
quote_text: The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
cta: In a moment of rage, run to the name of Jesus.

description: Clothed in compassion. 1. Colossians 3:12 | 2. 1 Peter 3:8 | 3. Ephesians 4:2 | 4. Galatians 6:2
quote_text: Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.
cta: Dress your soul in kindness today.

description: Avoiding heated arguments. 1. Proverbs 17:14 | 2. Proverbs 20:3 | 3. 2 Timothy 2:23-24 | 4. Titus 3:9
quote_text: Starting a quarrel is like breaching a dam; so drop the matter before a dispute breaks out.
cta: Be the one to drop the matter first. That is true strength.

description: God’s grace is sufficient. 1. 2 Corinthians 12:9 | 2. Hebrews 4:16 | 3. Romans 5:20 | 4. 2 Peter 3:18
quote_text: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'
cta: His grace is stronger than your struggle with anger.

description: The peace of a steadfast mind. 1. Isaiah 26:3 | 2. Psalm 112:7 | 3. Romans 12:2 | 4. Philippians 4:8
quote_text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
cta: Keep your mind on Him, and the chaos will lose its power.

description: The Lord is near. 1. Philippians 4:5 | 2. Psalm 145:18 | 3. James 4:8 | 4. Matthew 28:20
quote_text: Let your gentleness be evident to all. The Lord is near.
cta: Remember: The Lord is watching and He is near. Act accordingly.

description: Forgive and you will be forgiven. 1. Luke 6:37 | 2. Matthew 18:21-22 | 3. Mark 11:25 | 4. Ephesians 4:32
quote_text: Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.
cta: Release the debt you're holding against someone today.

description: A heart of thankfulness. 1. Colossians 3:15 | 2. 1 Thessalonians 5:18 | 3. Psalm 100:4 | 4. Philippians 4:6
quote_text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts... and be thankful.
cta: It’s hard to stay angry when you’re busy being grateful.

description: The ultimate victory. 1. 1 Corinthians 15:57 | 2. Romans 8:37 | 3. 2 Corinthians 2:14 | 4. 1 John 5:4
quote_text: But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
cta: The victory over your temper is already yours in Christ.

description: God has not given you a spirit of fear. 1. 2 Timothy 1:7 | 2. Isaiah 41:10 | 3. Psalm 34:4 | 4. Joshua 1:9
quote_text: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
cta: Type 'POWER' if you are claiming a sound mind today!

description: The Lord is your light and salvation. 1. Psalm 27:1 | 2. Psalm 18:2 | 3. Micah 7:8 | 4. John 8:12
quote_text: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?
cta: With God on your side, fear has no place.

description: Do not be dismayed, He is your God. 1. Isaiah 41:10 | 2. Deuteronomy 31:6 | 3. Joshua 1:5 | 4. Romans 8:31
quote_text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you.
cta: He is holding your right hand. Trust Him.

description: Perfect love casts out fear. 1. 1 John 4:18 | 2. Romans 8:15 | 3. Psalm 56:3 | 4. Ephesians 3:17
quote_text: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment.
cta: Let His perfect love surround you and drive out every worry.

description: When I am afraid, I trust in You. 1. Psalm 56:3-4 | 2. Psalm 118:6 | 3. Proverbs 3:5 | 4. Isaiah 12:2
quote_text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you. In God, whose word I praise—in God I trust; I will not be afraid.
cta: What is one thing you are trusting God with today?

description: Be strong and courageous. 1. Joshua 1:9 | 2. Deuteronomy 31:8 | 3. 1 Chronicles 28:20 | 4. Psalm 27:14
quote_text: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you.
cta: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the presence of God.

description: He delivered me from all my fears. 1. Psalm 34:4-7 | 2. Psalm 107:6 | 3. 2 Samuel 22:7 | 4. Psalm 18:6
quote_text: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
cta: Seek Him today, and watch your fears fade.

description: Peace that surpasses understanding. 1. Philippians 4:6-7 | 2. John 14:27 | 3. Isaiah 26:3 | 4. Colossians 3:15
quote_text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition... the peace of God will guard your hearts.
cta: Trade your anxiety for His peace through prayer.

description: The Lord is on my side. 1. Psalm 118:6 | 2. Romans 8:31 | 3. Hebrews 13:6 | 4. Psalm 56:11
quote_text: The Lord is with me; I will not be afraid. What can mere mortals do to me?
cta: If God is for us, who can be against us?

description: Rest in the shadow of the Almighty. 1. Psalm 91:1-5 | 2. Psalm 121:5 | 3. Psalm 17:8 | 4. Isaiah 25:4
quote_text: You will not fear the terror of night, nor the arrow that flies by day.
cta: You are under His wings. You are safe.

description: Fear not, little flock. 1. Luke 12:32 | 2. John 10:11 | 3. Psalm 23:1 | 4. Ezekiel 34:11
quote_text: Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father has been pleased to give you the kingdom.
cta: The Shepherd is watching over you personally.

description: God is our refuge and strength. 1. Psalm 46:1-3 | 2. Psalm 62:8 | 3. Proverbs 14:26 | 4. Isaiah 33:2
quote_text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble. Therefore we will not fear.
cta: He is your mountain that cannot be moved.

description: The Lord goes before you. 1. Deuteronomy 31:8 | 2. Isaiah 45:2 | 3. Micah 2:13 | 4. Exodus 13:21
quote_text: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
cta: He has already been to your tomorrow. You can trust Him today.

description: Quietness and confidence. 1. Isaiah 30:15 | 2. Exodus 14:14 | 3. Psalm 46:10 | 4. Lamentations 3:26
quote_text: In quietness and trust is your strength.
cta: Silence the noise and let God be your strength.

description: Fear not, for I have redeemed you. 1. Isaiah 43:1-2 | 2. Galatians 3:13 | 3. Ephesians 1:7 | 4. Psalm 107:2
quote_text: Do not fear, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
cta: You belong to the King. Why should you fear?

description: The shield of faith. 1. Ephesians 6:16 | 2. Psalm 18:30 | 3. Genesis 15:1 | 4. Proverbs 30:5
quote_text: In addition to all this, take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.
cta: Your faith is a shield that fear cannot penetrate.

description: Even in the valley of the shadow of death. 1. Psalm 23:4 | 2. Job 10:21 | 3. Luke 1:79 | 4. Psalm 107:14
quote_text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.
cta: The valley is just a passage, not a destination.

description: Do not worry about tomorrow. 1. Matthew 6:34 | 2. Philippians 4:6 | 3. Psalm 55:22 | 4. 1 Peter 5:7
quote_text: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
cta: God is already in your tomorrow. Focus on His grace for today.

description: He gives power to the faint. 1. Isaiah 40:29-31 | 2. 2 Corinthians 12:9 | 3. Psalm 73:26 | 4. Ephesians 3:16
quote_text: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
cta: Let His strength carry you when you can't walk another step.

description: Fear of man is a snare. 1. Proverbs 29:25 | 2. Galatians 1:10 | 3. Psalm 56:11 | 4. Acts 5:29
quote_text: Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe.
cta: Choose God's approval over man's opinion.

description: The peace I give you. 1. John 14:27 | 2. John 16:33 | 3. Ephesians 2:14 | 4. 2 Thessalonians 3:16
quote_text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
cta: Receive the supernatural peace that only Jesus provides.

description: Stand still and see salvation. 1. Exodus 14:13 | 2. 2 Chronicles 20:17 | 3. Psalm 46:10 | 4. Isaiah 30:15
quote_text: Do not be afraid. Stand firm and you will see the deliverance the Lord will bring you today.
cta: Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is stand still and trust God.

description: Your life is hidden with Christ. 1. Colossians 3:3 | 2. Psalm 31:20 | 3. Psalm 27:5 | 4. John 10:28
quote_text: For you died, and your life is now hidden with Christ in God.
cta: You are safe in the palm of His hand.

description: He will cover you with His feathers. 1. Psalm 91:4 | 2. Matthew 23:37 | 3. Ruth 2:12 | 4. Psalm 17:8

cta: God can find a way where you see no way out.

description: You are precious. 1. Isaiah 43:4 | 2. Psalm 139:14 | 3. Ephesians 2:10 | 4. 1 Peter 2:9
quote_text: Since you are precious and honored in my sight, and because I love you...
cta: Your value is defined by God, not by your feelings.

description: Restored Joy. 1. Psalm 51:12 | 2. Psalm 126:2 | 3. Nehemiah 8:10 | 4. Romans 15:13
quote_text: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and grant me a willing spirit, to sustain me.
cta: Ask God to bring back the smile to your soul.

description: The armor of God. 1. Ephesians 6:10-17 | 2. Romans 13:12 | 3. 2 Corinthians 10:4 | 4. 1 Thessalonians 5:8
quote_text: Put on the full armor of God, so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes.
cta: Put on your armor. The battle for your mind is won in Christ.

description: The Lord is your keeper. 1. Psalm 121:5 | 2. Psalm 121:3 | 3. 2 Thessalonians 3:3 | 4. 1 Peter 1:5
quote_text: The Lord watches over you—the Lord is your shade at your right hand.
cta: He never takes His eyes off you.

description: A new creation. 1. 2 Corinthians 5:17 | 2. Galatians 2:20 | 3. Ephesians 4:24 | 4. Colossians 3:10
quote_text: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
cta: Depression is part of your past; Christ is your new life.

description: Confidence in the Lord. 1. Hebrews 10:35 | 2. Philippians 1:6 | 3. Proverbs 3:26 | 4. Psalm 27:3
quote_text: So do not throw away your confidence; it will be richly rewarded.
cta: Don't give up. Your faithfulness will be rewarded.

description: Living water. 1. John 4:14 | 2. John 7:37 | 3. Revelation 21:6 | 4. Psalm 42:1
quote_text: But whoever drinks the water I give them will never thirst.
cta: Drink from His presence and find your soul satisfied.

description: Under His shadow. 1. Psalm 91:1 | 2. Psalm 17:8 | 3. Psalm 63:7 | 4. Isaiah 25:4
quote_text: Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
cta: Make God your home, and find rest for your spirit.

description: The joy of salvation. 1. 1 Peter 1:8-9 | 2. Psalm 13:5 | 3. Habakkuk 3:18 | 4. Isaiah 12:3
quote_text: Though you have not seen him, you love him... and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy.
cta: There is a joy deeper than your current circumstances.

description: The mind of Christ. 1. 1 Corinthians 2:16 | 2. Philippians 2:5 | 3. Romans 8:6 | 4. Colossians 3:2
quote_text: For who has known the mind of the Lord... But we have the mind of Christ.
cta: You have the mind of Christ. Think with His peace and authority.

description: Goodness in the land of the living. 1. Psalm 27:13 | 2. Psalm 31:19 | 3. Psalm 34:8 | 4. Exodus 33:19
quote_text: I remain confident of this: I will see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.
cta: Don't lose heart. You will see better days.

description: He will not crush you. 1. Isaiah 42:3 | 2. Matthew 12:20 | 3. Psalm 103:13 | 4. Lamentations 3:32
quote_text: A bruised reed he will not break, and a smoldering wick he will not snuff out.
cta: God is gentle with your fragile heart.

description: Your life is a light. 1. Matthew 5:14 | 2. Ephesians 5:8 | 3. Philippians 2:15 | 4. Psalm 119:105
quote_text: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.
cta: Even a small spark can drive away the dark. Keep shining.

description: Perfect love. 1. 1 John 4:18 | 2. Romans 8:38-39 | 3. Ephesians 3:17-19 | 4. Zephaniah 3:17
quote_text: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.
cta: Let His infinite love silence the voices of despair.

description: The God who restores. 1. 1 Peter 5:10 | 2. Joel 2:25 | 3. Job 42:12 | 4. Jeremiah 30:17
quote_text: And the God of all grace... will himself restore you and make you strong, firm and steadfast.
cta: Your restoration will be greater than your struggle.

description: Focus on the good. 1. Philippians 4:8 | 2. Colossians 3:2 | 3. Hebrews 12:2 | 4. Psalm 103:2
quote_text: Whatever is true, whatever is noble, whatever is right, whatever is pure... think about such things.
cta: Fix your thoughts on what is beautiful and true today.

description: The Lord is your Shepherd. 1. Psalm 23:1 | 2. John 10:11 | 3. Isaiah 40:11 | 4. Ezekiel 34:11
quote_text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
cta: Let the Shepherd lead you to still waters.

description: A heart of gratitude. 1. 1 Thessalonians 5:18 | 2. Colossians 3:15 | 3. Psalm 100:4 | 4. Philippians 4:6
quote_text: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
cta: Finding one thing to be thankful for can change your day.

description: Abundant life. 1. John 10:10 | 2. John 15:11 | 3. Ephesians 3:20 | 4. Psalm 16:11
quote_text: I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
cta: Jesus came to give you a full, meaningful life. Choose life today.

description: The end of the matter. 1. Ecclesiastes 7:8 | 2. Job 8:7 | 3. Habakkuk 2:3 | 4. Revelation 21:4
quote_text: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
cta: One day, all pain will be a memory. Hold on for that day.

description: The God of All Comfort. 1. 2 Corinthians 1:3-4 | 2. Isaiah 51:12 | 3. Psalm 119:50 | 4. Matthew 5:4
quote_text: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ... who comforts us in all our troubles.
cta: Type 'AMEN' if you are leaning on His comfort today.

description: Blessed are those who mourn. 1. Matthew 5:4 | 2. Isaiah 61:2 | 3. Psalm 147:3 | 4. Revelation 21:4
quote_text: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
cta: Your tears are not ignored; they are a bridge to His comfort.

description: He counts your tears. 1. Psalm 56:8 | 2. Psalm 126:5 | 3. Revelation 7:17 | 4. Isaiah 25:8
quote_text: You keep track of all my sorrows. You have collected all my tears in your bottle. You have recorded each one in your book.
cta: Every tear you cry matters to the Father.

description: He heals the brokenhearted. 1. Psalm 147:3 | 2. Psalm 34:18 | 3. Luke 4:18 | 4. Isaiah 61:1
quote_text: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
cta: God is a gentle healer. Let Him bind up your wounds today.

description: The Darkest Valley. 1. Psalm 23:4 | 2. Job 10:21 | 3. Micah 7:8 | 4. John 1:5
quote_text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
cta: You are walking 'through' it. You aren't staying there.

description: No more death or pain. 1. Revelation 21:4 | 2. Isaiah 25:8 | 3. 1 Corinthians 15:54 | 4. Revelation 22:3
quote_text: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
cta: Our temporary pain is met by His eternal promise.

description: The Lord is close. 1. Psalm 34:18 | 2. Psalm 145:18 | 3. Matthew 28:20 | 4. Hebrews 13:5
quote_text: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
cta: When you feel most alone, God is most near.

description: Rest for the weary. 1. Matthew 11:28 | 2. Jeremiah 31:25 | 3. Psalm 62:1 | 4. Isaiah 40:29
quote_text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
cta: Grief is heavy. Let Jesus carry the weight for a while.

description: Hope in the Resurrection. 1. 1 Thessalonians 4:13-14 | 2. John 11:25 | 3. 1 Corinthians 15:20 | 4. Job 19:25
quote_text: Brothers and sisters, we do not want you to be uninformed about those who sleep in death, so that you do not grieve like the rest of mankind, who have no hope.
cta: We don't say goodbye; we say 'see you soon.'

description: The Man of Sorrows. 1. Isaiah 53:3 | 2. John 11:35 | 3. Hebrews 4:15 | 4. Matthew 26:38
quote_text: He was despised and rejected by mankind, a man of suffering, and familiar with pain.
cta: Jesus isn't watching your grief; He is feeling it with you.

description: Jesus Wept. 1. John 11:35 | 2. Luke 19:41 | 3. Hebrews 5:7 | 4. John 11:33
quote_text: Jesus wept.
cta: It is okay to cry. Even the Savior did.

description: Sowing in tears. 1. Psalm 126:5-6 | 2. Galatians 6:9 | 3. 2 Corinthians 4:17 | 4. Psalm 30:5
quote_text: Those who sow with tears will reap with songs of joy.
cta: Your current tears are seeds for a future season of joy.

description: The Resurrection and the Life. 1. John 11:25-26 | 2. John 5:24 | 3. Romans 6:23 | 4. 1 John 5:11
quote_text: Jesus said to her, 'I am the resurrection and the life. The one who believes in me will live, even though they die.'
cta: Death has lost its sting because of Christ.

description: Beauty for Ashes. 1. Isaiah 61:3 | 2. Joel 2:25 | 3. Romans 8:28 | 4. Psalm 30:11
quote_text: To provide for those who grieve... to bestow on them a crown of beauty instead of ashes.
cta: God is an artist who can turn your pain into a masterpiece.

description: He sustains you. 1. Psalm 55:22 | 2. 1 Peter 5:7 | 3. Psalm 68:19 | 4. Isaiah 46:4
quote_text: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
cta: Let Him be the ground beneath your feet when the world shakes.

description: My portion forever. 1. Psalm 73:26 | 2. Lamentations 3:24 | 3. Psalm 16:5 | 4. Psalm 119:57
quote_text: My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.
cta: When your heart feels empty, God is enough.

description: Peace I leave with you. 1. John 14:27 | 2. John 16:33 | 3. Philippians 4:7 | 4. 2 Thessalonians 3:16
quote_text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you... Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
cta: Receive the peace that the world cannot give or take away.

description: Under His Wings. 1. Psalm 91:4 | 2. Ruth 2:12 | 3. Psalm 17:8 | 4. Psalm 63:7
quote_text: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.
cta: Let the Father hide you in His embrace today.

description: He knows our frame. 1. Psalm 103:13-14 | 2. Hebrews 4:15 | 3. Job 23:10 | 4. Psalm 139:1
quote_text: As a father has compassion on his children, so the Lord has compassion on those who fear him; for he knows how we are formed, he remembers that we are dust.
cta: God knows your limits. He doesn't expect you to be 'fine' right now.

description: The Morning Star. 1. 2 Peter 1:19 | 2. Revelation 22:16 | 3. Psalm 130:6 | 4. Isaiah 60:1
quote_text: And the morning star rises in your hearts.
cta: The darkness is passing. The morning is coming.

description: The Lord is my Shepherd. 1. Psalm 23:1 | 2. John 10:11 | 3. Ezekiel 34:11 | 4. Isaiah 40:11
quote_text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
cta: The Good Shepherd is leading you to a place of restoration.

description: God is our refuge. 1. Psalm 46:1 | 2. Psalm 62:8 | 3. 2 Samuel 22:3 | 4. Psalm 144:2
quote_text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
cta: He is your fortress when everything else falls apart.

description: He will not fail you. 1. Deuteronomy 31:8 | 2. Joshua 1:5 | 3. Hebrews 13:5 | 4. Isaiah 41:10
quote_text: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
cta: You don't have to face this loss alone. He is with you.

description: Sustained by His Hand. 1. Psalm 37:24 | 2. Isaiah 41:13 | 3. Psalm 63:8 | 4. Psalm 139:10
quote_text: Though he may stumble, he will not fall, for the Lord upholds him with his hand.
cta: His hand is big enough to hold you and your sorrow.

description: Comfort for the Needy. 1. Isaiah 25:4 | 2. Psalm 12:5 | 3. Matthew 5:3 | 4. Psalm 113:7
quote_text: You have been a refuge for the poor, a refuge for the needy in their distress, a shelter from the storm.
cta: Let Him be your shelter until the storm of grief passes.

description: The God of Hope. 1. Romans 15:13 | 2. 1 Peter 1:3 | 3. Colossians 1:27 | 4. Hebrews 10:23
quote_text: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.
cta: Even in grief, hope is a person—and His name is Jesus.

description: New Mercies. 1. Lamentations 3:22-23 | 2. Psalm 59:16 | 3. Zephaniah 3:5 | 4. Isaiah 33:2
quote_text: Because of the Lord’s great love we are not consumed... his compassions never fail. They are new every morning.
cta: His love for you is the one thing that will never change.

description: I shall not want. 1. Psalm 23:1 | 2. Philippians 4:19 | 3. Matthew 6:33 | 4. Psalm 34:10
quote_text: The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want.
cta: He will provide the peace you need for this very hour.

description: He will Swallow up Death. 1. Isaiah 25:8 | 2. 1 Corinthians 15:54 | 3. Hosea 13:14 | 4. 2 Timothy 1:10
quote_text: He will swallow up death forever. The Sovereign Lord will wipe away the tears from all faces.
cta: One day, death will be nothing but a distant memory.

description: Turning Mourning to Dancing. 1. Psalm 30:11 | 2. Jeremiah 31:13 | 3. Isaiah 61:3 | 4. Psalm 126:2
quote_text: You turned my wailing into dancing; you removed my sackcloth and clothed me with joy.
cta: The season of wailing will end. The season of dancing will come.

description: Quietness and Trust. 1. Isaiah 30:15 | 2. Psalm 62:5 | 3. Habakkuk 2:20 | 4. Exodus 14:14
quote_text: In quietness and trust is your strength.
cta: You don't have to have all the answers. Just trust Him.

description: The Anchor of the Soul. 1. Hebrews 6:19 | 2. Psalm 71:5 | 3. Romans 8:24 | 4. 1 Peter 1:13
quote_text: We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure.
cta: Let His promises keep you steady when the world feels stormy.

description: Be Still and Know. 1. Psalm 46:10 | 2. 1 Kings 19:12 | 3. Zechariah 2:13 | 4. Psalm 37:7
quote_text: Be still, and know that I am God.
cta: In the silence, hear Him whisper His love to you.

description: Wait for the Lord. 1. Psalm 27:14 | 2. Isaiah 40:31 | 3. Psalm 130:5 | 4. Micah 7:7
quote_text: Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.
cta: Take heart. He is working in the waiting.

description: Heart at Peace. 1. Proverbs 14:30 | 2. John 14:1 | 3. Philippians 4:6 | 4. Colossians 3:15
quote_text: A heart at peace gives life to the body.
cta: His peace is a medicine for your soul.

description: The Comforter. 1. John 14:16 | 2. John 15:26 | 3. John 16:7 | 4. Romans 8:26
quote_text: And I will ask the Father, and he will give you another Comforter to help you and be with you forever.
cta: The Holy Spirit is with you right now, providing the comfort you need.

description: My Strength in Weakness. 1. 2 Corinthians 12:9 | 2. Joel 3:10 | 3. Isaiah 40:29 | 4. Psalm 28:7
quote_text: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'
cta: You don't have to be strong. His strength is perfect.

description: Light in the Darkness. 1. Psalm 18:28 | 2. John 8:12 | 3. 2 Samuel 22:29 | 4. Micah 7:8
quote_text: You, Lord, keep my lamp burning; my God turns my darkness into light.
cta: No shadow is too dark for the Light of the World.

description: A Very Present Help. 1. Psalm 46:1 | 2. Hebrews 4:16 | 3. Psalm 145:18 | 4. Matthew 28:20
quote_text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
cta: He isn't distant; He is right here in your sorrow.

description: Safe in His Hands. 1. John 10:28 | 2. Isaiah 49:16 | 3. Psalm 31:5 | 4. Deuteronomy 33:27
quote_text: I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand.
cta: You and your loved ones are held by the King.

description: The God of Peace. 1. Romans 15:33 | 2. Philippians 4:9 | 3. 1 Thessalonians 5:23 | 4. Hebrews 13:20
quote_text: Now may the God of peace be with you all.
cta: May His peace settle over your heart like a warm blanket.

description: He will Carry You. 1. Isaiah 46:4 | 2. Psalm 68:19 | 3. Exodus 19:4 | 4. Isaiah 63:9
quote_text: Even to your old age and gray hairs I am he, I am he who will sustain you. I have made you and I will carry you.
cta: When you can't walk another step, He will carry you.

description: Confidence in the Future. 1. Jeremiah 29:11 | 2. Romans 8:28 | 3. Psalm 37:37 | 4. Proverbs 23:18
quote_text: For I know the plans I have for you... plans to give you hope and a future.
cta: Grief is a chapter, but it's not the end of your book.

description: Rejoice in Hope. 1. Romans 12:12 | 2. Romans 5:2 | 3. 1 Peter 1:6 | 4. Hebrews 3:6
quote_text: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
cta: Keep praying, keep hoping, and keep holding on.

description: The Victory over Death. 1. 1 Corinthians 15:55-57 | 2. Hosea 13:14 | 3. 2 Timothy 1:10 | 4. Revelation 20:14
quote_text: Where, O death, is your victory? Where, O death, is your sting?... But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
cta: The grave is empty, and so is death's power.

description: Living for Christ. 1. Philippians 1:21 | 2. Galatians 2:20 | 3. Romans 14:8 | 4. 2 Corinthians 5:15
quote_text: For to me, to live is Christ and to die is gain.
cta: Whether here or there, we are always with Him.

description: God's Steadfast Love. 1. Lamentations 3:22 | 2. Psalm 136:1 | 3. Romans 8:39 | 4. Psalm 103:17
quote_text: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end.
cta: His love is the one constant in an uncertain world.

description: Seeing the Goodness. 1. Psalm 27:13 | 2. Psalm 34:8 | 3. Psalm 31:19 | 4. Exodus 33:19
quote_text: I remain confident of this: I will see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.
cta: There is still goodness ahead for you. Believe it.

description: Consider it pure joy. 1. James 1:2-4 | 2. Romans 5:3 | 3. 1 Peter 1:6 | 4. Habakkuk 3:17-18
quote_text: Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds, because you know that the testing of your faith produces perseverance.
cta: Type 'JOY' if you are trusting God's process today!

description: Rejoice in the Lord always. 1. Philippians 4:4 | 2. 1 Thessalonians 5:16 | 3. Psalm 33:1 | 4. Romans 12:12
quote_text: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
cta: Joy is a choice, not a feeling. Choose to rejoice today.

description: The joy of the Lord is your strength. 1. Nehemiah 8:10 | 2. Psalm 28:7 | 3. Isaiah 12:3 | 4. Habakkuk 3:19
quote_text: Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
seo_keywords: joy of the lord is my strength
cta: When you lose your joy, you lose your strength. Lean into Him.

description: Glorying in suffering. 1. Romans 5:3-5 | 2. 2 Corinthians 12:9 | 3. Colossians 1:24 | 4. 1 Peter 4:13
quote_text: We also glory in our sufferings, because we know that suffering produces perseverance; perseverance, character; and character, hope.
cta: Your current trial is building a character that will sustain your future.

description: A song in the night. 1. Psalm 42:8 | 2. Job 35:10 | 3. Acts 16:25 | 4. Psalm 77:6
quote_text: By day the Lord directs his love, at night his song is with me—a prayer to the God of my life.
cta: Don't let the darkness silence your song.

description: Sowing in tears, reaping in joy. 1. Psalm 126:5-6 | 2. Matthew 5:4 | 3. Isaiah 61:3 | 4. Revelation 21:4
quote_text: Those who sow with tears will reap with songs of joy.
cta: Every tear you cry is a seed for a future shout of joy.

description: Great is your reward. 1. Matthew 5:11-12 | 2. Luke 6:22-23 | 3. Hebrews 10:35 | 4. James 1:12
quote_text: Rejoice and be glad, because great is your reward in heaven.
cta: Your perspective changes when you look at the eternal reward.

description: Though the fig tree does not blossom. 1. Habakkuk 3:17-18 | 2. Job 1:21 | 3. Psalm 34:1 | 4. Philippians 4:11
quote_text: Yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will be joyful in God my Savior.
cta: Even if everything fails, God is still worthy of your joy.

description: Overflowing with hope. 1. Romans 15:13 | 2. Romans 12:12 | 3. Psalm 16:11 | 4. John 15:11
quote_text: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope.
cta: Let God fill your cup until it overflows with hope today.

description: Refined like gold. 1. 1 Peter 1:6-7 | 2. Job 23:10 | 3. Zechariah 13:9 | 4. Malachi 3:3
quote_text: In all this you greatly rejoice, though now for a little while you may have had to suffer grief in all kinds of trials... these have come so that the proven genuineness of your faith... may result in praise.
cta: The fire isn't there to consume you, but to clean you.

description: Everlasting Joy. 1. Isaiah 35:10 | 2. Isaiah 51:11 | 3. Isaiah 61:7 | 4. Psalm 16:11
quote_text: Everlasting joy will crown their heads. Gladness and joy will overtake them, and sorrow and sighing will flee away.
cta: Sorrow is temporary; the joy God gives is eternal.

description: A cheerful heart. 1. Proverbs 17:22 | 2. Proverbs 15:13 | 3. Proverbs 15:15 | 4. Psalm 126:2
quote_text: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
cta: Take a dose of God's joy today—it's the best medicine for your soul.

description: Rejoicing in Hope. 1. Romans 12:12 | 2. Hebrews 3:6 | 3. Psalm 33:21 | 4. Romans 5:2
quote_text: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
cta: Joy in hope gives you the power to be patient in the pain.

description: Fullness of Joy. 1. Psalm 16:11 | 2. Psalm 21:6 | 3. Acts 2:28 | 4. Psalm 43:4
quote_text: You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence.
cta: Real joy isn't found in things, but in His presence.

description: Count your blessings. 1. Psalm 103:2 | 2. Ephesians 1:3 | 3. 1 Thessalonians 5:18 | 4. Psalm 68:19
quote_text: Praise the Lord, my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
cta: Gratitude is the shortcut to joy. What are you thankful for today?

description: Light shines in the dark. 1. Psalm 112:4 | 2. Micah 7:8 | 3. John 1:5 | 4. Psalm 18:28
quote_text: Even in darkness light dawns for the upright, for those who are gracious and compassionate and righteous.
cta: The darker the night, the brighter His joy shines.

description: The Fruit of the Spirit. 1. Galatians 5:22-23 | 2. Romans 14:17 | 3. Ephesians 5:9 | 4. 1 Thessalonians 1:6
quote_text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness...
cta: Joy is a fruit that grows in the soil of surrender.

description: Joy in the Word. 1. Jeremiah 15:16 | 2. Psalm 119:111 | 3. Psalm 19:8 | 4. 1 John 1:4
quote_text: When your words came, I ate them; they were my joy and my heart’s delight.
cta: Feed your soul on the Word and watch your joy return.

description: Unspeakable Joy. 1. 1 Peter 1:8 | 2. 2 Corinthians 9:15 | 3. Psalm 147:1 | 4. Isaiah 12:6
quote_text: Though you have not seen him, you love him; and even though you do not see him now, you believe in him and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy.
cta: Some joys are too deep for words. Experience His glory today.

description: The kingdom is joy. 1. Romans 14:17 | 2. Matthew 6:33 | 3. Luke 17:21 | 4. Psalm 45:7
quote_text: For the kingdom of God is not a matter of eating and drinking, but of righteousness, peace and joy in the Holy Spirit.
cta: Living in the Kingdom means living in His joy.

description: Victory through Praise. 1. 2 Chronicles 20:21-22 | 2. Acts 16:25-26 | 3. Psalm 149:6 | 4. Isaiah 61:3
quote_text: As they began to sing and praise, the Lord set ambushes against the men... and they were defeated.
cta: Praise is the sound of your victory before it arrives.

description: Gladness for the upright. 1. Psalm 97:11 | 2. Psalm 64:10 | 3. Psalm 32:11 | 4. Psalm 68:3
quote_text: Light is shed on the righteous and joy on the upright in heart.
cta: Keep your heart right and His joy will find you.

description: Beauty for Ashes. 1. Isaiah 61:1-3 | 2. Psalm 30:11 | 3. Jeremiah 31:13 | 4. Joel 2:25
quote_text: He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted... to bestow on them a crown of beauty instead of ashes, the oil of joy instead of mourning.
cta: God is trading your sorrow for His splendor.

description: Dance of Joy. 1. Psalm 30:11 | 2. Jeremiah 31:13 | 3. 2 Samuel 6:14 | 4. Luke 15:23-24
quote_text: You turned my wailing into dancing; you removed my sackcloth and clothed me with joy.
cta: Get ready to dance—your season of mourning is ending.

description: The joy of salvation. 1. Psalm 51:12 | 2. 1 Peter 1:9 | 3. Isaiah 12:3 | 4. Luke 10:20
quote_text: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and grant me a willing spirit, to sustain me.
cta: The greatest reason to be joyful is that your name is written in Heaven.

description: Laughter like a child. 1. Psalm 126:2 | 2. Job 8:21 | 3. Genesis 21:6 | 4. Proverbs 31:25
quote_text: Our mouths were filled with laughter, our tongues with songs of joy.
cta: God is going to give you a reason to laugh again.

description: Strength from delight. 1. Psalm 37:4 | 2. Isaiah 58:14 | 3. Psalm 1:2 | 4. Job 22:26
quote_text: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
cta: Make Him your greatest treasure and your joy will never fail.

description: Abundant life. 1. John 10:10 | 2. Psalm 36:8 | 3. Isaiah 55:12 | 4. Romans 15:13
quote_text: I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
cta: Jesus didn't come just to save you, but to give you an abundant life.

description: Joy in every season. 1. Ecclesiastes 3:4 | 2. Psalm 104:34 | 3. Philippians 4:12 | 4. Habakkuk 3:18
quote_text: I will rejoice in the Lord, I will be joyful in God my Savior.
cta: Seasons change, but the Source of your joy never does.

description: Well-watered garden. 1. Isaiah 58:11 | 2. Jeremiah 31:12 | 3. John 4:14 | 4. Psalm 1:3
quote_text: The Lord will guide you always... You will be like a well-watered garden, like a spring whose waters never fail.
cta: Stay connected to the Source and your joy will never run dry.

description: Victory over grief. 1. Isaiah 51:11 | 2. John 16:20 | 3. 2 Corinthians 6:10 | 4. Psalm 147:3
quote_text: Your sorrow will turn into joy.
cta: The very thing that caused you pain will become your greatest testimony of joy.

description: Confidence in God's love. 1. Romans 8:38-39 | 2. Zephaniah 3:17 | 3. Psalm 63:3 | 4. 1 John 4:16
quote_text: The Lord your God is with you... He will take great delight in you; in his love he will no longer rebuke you, but will rejoice over you with singing.
cta: God is literally singing with joy over you right now.

description: Looking to the finish line. 1. Hebrews 12:2 | 2. 2 Timothy 4:7-8 | 3. James 1:12 | 4. Revelation 22:12
quote_text: For the joy set before him he endured the cross, scorning its shame, and sat down at the right hand of the throne of God.
cta: Fix your eyes on the joy waiting at the end of the race.

description: Walking in the light. 1. Psalm 89:15 | 2. 1 John 1:7 | 3. Isaiah 2:5 | 4. Ephesians 5:8
quote_text: Blessed are those who have learned to acclaim you, who walk in the light of your presence, Lord.
cta: Joy is found in the light of His face.

description: Anointed with joy. 1. Hebrews 1:9 | 2. Psalm 45:7 | 3. Isaiah 61:3 | 4. Psalm 23:5
quote_text: You have loved righteousness and hated wickedness; therefore God, your God, has set you above your companions by anointing you with the oil of joy.
cta: Receive a fresh anointing of joy today.

description: Quiet Confidence. 1. Isaiah 30:15 | 2. Psalm 46:10 | 3. Philippians 4:7 | 4. Exodus 14:14
quote_text: In quietness and trust is your strength.
cta: Quiet your soul and let His joy settle in.

description: The hope of glory. 1. Colossians 1:27 | 2. Romans 5:2 | 3. 1 Timothy 1:1 | 4. 1 Peter 1:3
quote_text: To them God has chosen to make known among the Gentiles the glorious riches of this mystery, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
seo_keywords: christ in you hope of glory
cta: The hope of glory is living inside you. Let that spark your joy.

description: Perfect Peace. 1. Isaiah 26:3 | 2. John 14:27 | 3. 2 Thessalonians 3:16 | 4. Psalm 119:165
quote_text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
cta: Peace is the atmosphere where joy grows.

description: Lifting up the head. 1. Psalm 3:3 | 2. Psalm 27:6 | 3. Luke 21:28 | 4. Isaiah 51:11
quote_text: But you, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.
cta: Stop looking down at your problems; look up at your Savior.

description: Joyful Sacrifice. 1. Hebrews 13:15 | 2. Psalm 107:22 | 3. Psalm 116:17 | 4. 2 Corinthians 8:2
quote_text: Through Jesus, therefore, let us continually offer to God a sacrifice of praise—the fruit of lips that openly profess his name.
cta: When it's hardest to praise, that's when it matters most.

description: Steadfast Joy. 1. Psalm 112:7 | 2. Psalm 57:7 | 3. 1 Corinthians 15:58 | 4. Hebrews 6:19
quote_text: They will have no fear of bad news; their hearts are steadfast, trusting in the Lord.
seo_keywords: no fear of bad news bible
cta: Bad news can't steal your joy when your heart is anchored in God.

description: The joy of wisdom. 1. Proverbs 3:13 | 2. Proverbs 8:34 | 3. James 1:5 | 4. Ecclesiastes 2:26
quote_text: Blessed are those who find wisdom, those who gain understanding.
cta: Wisdom shows you the joy that others miss.

description: Rejoice with trembling. 1. Psalm 2:11 | 2. Philippians 2:12 | 3. Hebrews 12:28 | 4. Psalm 5:11
quote_text: Serve the Lord with fear and celebrate his rule with trembling.
seo_keywords: serve with fear rejoice with trembling
cta: True joy is rooted in a deep respect for who God is.

description: He will complete it. 1. Philippians 1:6 | 2. 1 Thessalonians 5:24 | 3. Psalm 138:8 | 4. Jude 1:24
quote_text: Being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
cta: You can be joyful today because God is not finished with you yet.

description: Everlasting Love. 1. Jeremiah 31:3 | 2. Romans 8:35 | 3. Psalm 103:17 | 4. Isaiah 54:10
quote_text: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.
cta: Knowing you are loved forever is the ultimate source of joy.

description: The cup overflows. 1. Psalm 23:5 | 2. John 7:38 | 3. Ephesians 3:20 | 4. Psalm 65:11
quote_text: You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.
cta: Your life is full of reasons to be joyful. Look for the overflow.

description: Final Victory. 1. Revelation 21:4 | 2. 1 Corinthians 15:54 | 3. Isaiah 25:8 | 4. Revelation 7:17
quote_text: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.
cta: One day, joy will be the only thing you ever feel. Hold on to that promise.
